TopicTitle: Vernor engines and RCS build aid

Articles.Content:
Hello

There's no menu for Vernor engines in SPH or VBA to cut them or switch them on in order to be able to use RCS build aid to reduce torque on attitude and translation.

With Ferram, vernor engines can be used for stability purpose at high mach and also for docking.

This won't be the same engines working for attitude and for translation, so it would be great to have menu under SPH or VBA enabling to cut vernor we want to cut so as to study with RCS build aid.
